misc.aboutInfo: Our dedicated team will ensure a smooth and fast delivery of our systems with free shipping. You will always be aware of the current status of your shipment. Our Golden Service is to develop a comprehensive service and offer competitive pricing in order to meet customers' unique and specific needs. Our services cover the Sultanate of Oman and China.
misc.resultText: The volume of the commercial shipment in cubic metres
misc.learnAboutUs: A documented group that provides many value-added services related to freight of all types (air and sea freight and internal delivery in the Sultanate of Oman)
misc.marqueeText: Majan Shipping Company provides services such as (land freight, sea freight and air freight); It also offers a group of courses in the field of shipping, such as the import course from China, the Alibaba program for safe and successful import, and other specialized courses.
misc.fromPlace: From your place to your destination we deliver our services on time safely
misc.majanOcean: Majan Ocean Freight provides its customers with reliable services, efficient and Least Load (LTL) freighter services they require for their regional and domestic shipments.
misc.type1: The import course from China and the Alibaba program for safe and successful import
misc.contactDaily: Contact us directly if you have any questions or inquiries, do not hesitate to contact us or send us a message, we will answer you within 24 hours!
misc.quality: Quality and performance at the right price
misc.courseText: The Shipping Problems course deals with the most important export problems that you face, starting with the internal and external difficulties in shipping operations, passing through transportation problems and the documents required for export, as well as dealing with shipping lines, airlines and land transport, in addition to the problems of export ports and ports of arrival in the country of import.
misc.serviceShip: Majan Express Ocean Freight provides customers with the reliable and efficient truckload and less than cargo services they need for their regional and domestic shipments.
misc.servicePlane: Across our global network, you can choose the service that best suits your needs, Majan Express can handle your air freight shipment to and from anywhere across China, Turkey and Oman through our global partners and agents.
misc.serviceLand: Majan Express Land Cargo provides customers with the reliable and efficient truckload and less than load services they need for their regional and domestic shipments.
misc.sizeInfo1: The meaning of CBM is known in English as Cubic Meter, and in Arabic it is called the cubic meter, which is the product of multiplying length by width by height. This unit of measurement is used in shipping and clearance companies. When you ship products overseas by container (container), you calculate the packaging volume (carton) in cubic meters, and when you know the size of your goods.
misc.sizeInfo2: You choose the appropriate unit of measurement for you, whether it is a centimeter or an inch, and then you enter the length of the carton, then its width, then its height, and at the end you enter the number, that is, the number of cartons you have, and the site will give you how many cubic meters your goods are equal to, that is, how many CBM you need in order to ship them, as the size of your goods may be It is small and you do not need a full container, so you can ship partially, and the size of the goods may be huge, so you need a large container or two small containers, and here are the container sizes commonly used in shipping companies.
